span.div: Oak View School is closed for the remainder of the year. All events and activities are cancelled.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 4px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; line-height: 15px; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

div.p: Starting next Monday, April 20th, your child will be assigned required classwork in the form of weekly "work packets" that will be due the following Monday. The packets will be available for pick up every Friday (starting April 17th) from 10AM - 2PM at the classroom door.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 4px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; line-height: 15px; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
margin: 0px 0px 4px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; line-height: 15px; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

div.p: Please remember the office is CLOSED and the door is locked. All communication with the office staff needs to be done by phone or email.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 4px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; line-height: 15px; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
margin: 0px 0px 4px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; line-height: 15px; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

div.p: A partir del próximo lunes 20 de abril, a su hijo se le asignará el trabajo de clase requerido en forma de "paquetes de trabajo" semanales que se entregarán el lunes siguiente. Los paquetes estarán disponibles para recoger todos los viernes (a partir del 17 de abril) de 10 a.m. hasta 2 p.m. en la puerta de clase.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 4px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; line-height: 15px; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
margin: 0px 0px 4px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; line-height: 15px; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

div.p: Recuerde que la oficina está CERRADA y la puerta está cerrada. Toda comunicación con el personal de la oficina debe hacerse por teléfono o correo electrónico.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 4px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; line-height: 15px; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
margin: 0px 0px 4px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; line-height: 15px; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
margin: 0px 0px 4px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; line-height: 15px; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
